Oh wow, looks like some of you guys aren't too familiar with .mds...

Well, basically, .MDS is a duplicate of a CD, but different in an .ISO in that you don't need to burn it to a disk or get special software, as long as you have something like Alcohol.  The data is stored on a .MDF file, and you have to right-click and mount the .MDS file to a CD, so that it'll run.  It basically eliminates the need for a crack, CD, and fancy software.

A note to anyone downloading this: If you have Alcohol 120%, DO NOT DOWNLOAD .MDF and .MDS FILES WITH AZUREUS.  Azureus will quit, and refuse to load.  

See this site for more info:
http://faq.vuze.com/?View=entry&EntryID=116

For everyone that is confused...

To run this game do this:

1. download the file
2. get alcohol 120% (trial works fine)
3. install alcohol
4. go to the  aoe file (mdf/largest)
5. right click on the mdf file
6. select (mount to cd)
7. click the file now and install 
8. that's it!!!
